SELECT CONCAT('\'',t.name,'\'') typeName,COUNT(t.name) num,CONCAT('\'',t.id,'\'') typeId FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL c LEFT JOIN TEST_TREE t on c.is_major=t.id LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN cc on c.complaint_main_id=cc.complaint_main_id WHERE t.name is not null
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND c.visitor_date >= #{beginMonthDate} AND c.visitor_date <= #{endMonthDate}
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND cc.involve_hospital = #{officeId}
GROUP BY t.name

SELECT CONCAT('\'',t.name,'\'') typeName,COUNT(t.name) num,CONCAT('\'',t.id,'\'') typeId FROM AUDIT_ACCEPTANCE aa LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL c on aa.complaint_main_id=c.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN cc on aa.complaint_main_id=cc.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN TEST_TREE t on c.is_major=t.id WHERE t.name is not null
AND aa.create_date like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND aa.create_date >= #{beginMonthDate} AND aa.create_date <= #{endMonthDate}
AND aa.create_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND aa.create_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND aa.create_date like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND cc.involve_hospital = #{officeId}
GROUP BY t.name

SELECT CONCAT(if(cc.hospital_grade='1','三级甲等',if(cc.hospital_grade='2','三级乙等',if(cc.hospital_grade='3','二级甲等',if(cc.hospital_grade='4','二级乙等',if(cc.hospital_grade='5','乡镇卫生院',if(cc.hospital_grade='6','社区服务站',if(cc.hospital_grade='7','民营医院',if(cc.hospital_grade='8','门诊',''))))))))) name,COUNT(cc.hospital_grade) value FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL c LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN cc ON cc.complaint_main_id=c.complaint_main_id WHERE
c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{year},'%')
c.visitor_date >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.visitor_date <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND cc.involve_hospital = #{officeId}
AND cc.hospital_grade is NOT NULL AND cc.hospital_grade !='' GROUP BY cc.hospital_grade

SELECT CONCAT(if(cc.hospital_grade='1','三级甲等',if(cc.hospital_grade='2','三级乙等',if(cc.hospital_grade='3','二级甲等',if(cc.hospital_grade='4','二级乙等',if(cc.hospital_grade='5','乡镇卫生院',if(cc.hospital_grade='6','社区服务站',if(cc.hospital_grade='7','民营医院',if(cc.hospital_grade='8','门诊',''))))))))) name,COUNT(cc.hospital_grade) value FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT c LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE cc ON cc.id=c.HOSPITAL_ID WHERE cc.hospital_grade is NOT NULL and cc.hospital_grade !=''
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND c.reporting_time >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.reporting_time <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND c.hospital_id = #{officeId}
GROUP BY cc.hospital_grade

SELECT COUNT(visitor_date) num,CONCAT('\'',SUBSTRING_INDEX(visitor_date,'-',2),'\'') monthDate FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL c LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN a on c.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id WHERE
visitor_date like concat('%',#{year},'%')
visitor_date >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND visitor_date <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
visitor_date like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND a.involve_hospital = #{officeId}
GROUP BY SUBSTRING_INDEX(visitor_date,'-',2)

SELECT COUNT(reporting_time) num,CONCAT('\'',SUBSTRING_INDEX(reporting_time,'-',2),'\'') monthDate FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT c WHERE
reporting_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
reporting_time >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND reporting_time <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
reporting_time like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND c.hospital_id = #{officeId}
GROUP BY SUBSTRING_INDEX(reporting_time,'-',2)

SELECT sa.`name` as name, count(*) as value FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL c LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN a on c.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o ON o.id = a.involve_hospital LEFT JOIN SYS_AREA sa ON sa.id = o.area_id WHERE a.del_flag ='0' AND sa.`name` IS NOT NULL
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND c.visitor_date >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.visitor_date <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND a.involve_hospital = #{officeId}
GROUP BY sa.`name`

SELECT sa.`name` as name, count(*) as value FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT c LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o ON o.id = c.hospital_id LEFT JOIN SYS_AREA sa ON sa.id = o.area_id WHERE sa.`name` IS NOT NULL
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND c.reporting_time >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.reporting_time <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND c.hospital_id = #{officeId}
GROUP BY sa.`name`

SELECT concat('\'',t.`name`,'\'') name, count(a.involve_department) as department FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL c LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN a on c.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN TEST_TREE t ON t.id = a.involve_department WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND t.id is not null
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND c.visitor_date >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.visitor_date <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND c.visitor_date like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND a.involve_hospital = #{officeId}
GROUP BY a.involve_department ORDER BY count(a.involve_department) ASC

SELECT concat('\'',IF(c.name is null or c.name='','无涉及专业',c.name),'\'') AS name,COUNT(1) AS department from( SELECT substring_index( substring_index( trim(REPLACE(REPLACE(a.related_major, CHAR(10), ''), CHAR(13), '')), '+', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), '+',- 1 ) NAME ,a.reporting_time,a.hospital_id FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT a JOIN mysql.HELP_TOPIC b ON b.help_topic_id <( length( a.related_major ) - length( REPLACE ( a.related_major, '+', '' ) ) + 1 ) where a.del_flag ='0' )c WHERE
c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
c.reporting_time >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.reporting_time <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
c.reporting_time like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND c.hospital_id = #{officeId}
GROUP BY c.name

SELECT aa.duty_ratio name,count(1) value FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT aa WHERE aa.duty_ratio is NOT null AND aa.duty_ratio !=''
AND aa.reporting_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND aa.reporting_time >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND aa.reporting_time <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND aa.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND aa.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND aa.reporting_time like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND aa.hospital_id = #{officeId}
GROUP BY LEFT(aa.duty_ratio,2)

SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) <=20000 THEN '2万及以下' WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) >20000 AND IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) <=100000 THEN '2万到10万及以下' WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) >100000 AND IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) <=500000 THEN '10万到50万及以下' WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) >500000 THEN '50万以上' END AS name, count(s.agreement_amount ) AS value FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT s WHERE s.agreement_amount is not null
AND s.reporting_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND s.reporting_time >= #{beginMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.reporting_time <= #{endMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND s.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND s.reporting_time like concat('%',#{beginMonthDate},'%')
AND s.reporting_time like concat('%',#{endMonthDate},'%')
AND s.hospital_id = #{officeId}
GROUP BY CASE WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) <=20000 THEN '2万及以下' WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) >20000 AND IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) <=100000 THEN '2万到10万及以下' WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) >100000 AND IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) <=500000 THEN '10万到50万及以下' WHEN IFNULL(s.agreement_amount, 0) >500000 THEN '50万以上' END
